metadata.abstract: Letter apologizing for not writing because of spending time in Engineering Camp, followed by a fall that caused a leg injury and hospitalization in Fort Wayne from July 30th to September 15th. He wishes Stearns an enjoyable year abroad. Luk cannot remit money owed prior to Stearns' trip and asks for advice.
